tool_description: Configures BIOS/UEFI settings for optimal OS installation including boot order, secure boot, TPM settings, and hardware compatibility modes.

boot_priority_devices.description: Ordered list of boot devices by priority

uefi_mode.description: Whether to use UEFI mode (false for Legacy BIOS)

fast_boot_disabled.description: Whether to disable fast boot for installation

error_messages: BIOS access denied: Unable to access BIOS configuration interface.
Invalid boot device: One or more specified boot devices are not recognized.
Secure boot configuration failed: Unable to modify secure boot settings.
TPM module not found: System does not have TPM capability.
UEFI mode not supported: System only supports Legacy BIOS mode.
usage: Set boot_priority_devices with installation media first (e.g., ['USB', 'HDD', 'CD/DVD']). Enable secure_boot for Windows 11 requirements. Disable fast_boot_disabled for installation troubleshooting.

configuration_applied.description: Whether all requested changes were successfully applied
